description: Comfortable, lightweight fleece jacket for year-round wear. Perfect for a brisk summer evening or as a midlayer in the winter, this sustainably designed jacket is made of recycled polyester fleece, solution dyed for reduced environmental impact. Cut and colors were carefully selected to reduce leftover materials. Enjoy lightweight warmth in good conscience with Innominata Light!
name: Mammut Innominata Light ML Jacket - Mens
